topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f406de6368725332500900#post_54f406de6368725332500900
[bq="trashboat"]"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f4054d6368723adca10600#post_54f4054d6368723adca10600
To Sum up What G specifically is about.

Every four years each nation rallies one fighter in a giant robot called a Gundam, The Nation Whos Gundam fighter is left standing gets to rule the universe. (And Meanwhile, A Super Gundam known as the Dark Gundam has landed on earth and is trying to exterminate humanity.)

It's over the top in the best way possible. (National stereotype robots, Martial arts, Ki blasts, And lots of shouting.)[/bq]
If anyone missed my post.
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

G gundam.

G is kind of the odd duck of the franchise. (The rest of the franchise is basically War Stories with Giant robots.)
